options.label: User friendly name of Disclaimer entry
options.name: disc-name

options.description: > Current disclaimer list, as shown in provisioning screens
options.label: Current disclaimers
options.name: disclaimers-current

commands.script:
file=/opt/cw/options/disclaimers.json
filetmp=/opt/cw/tmp/disclaimers.tmp
if [ ! -f "$file" ]; then echo "[]" > "$file"; fi
jq '. += [{"name":"@option.disc-name@","value":"@option.disc-text@","selected":@option.default@}]' $file > $filetmp
\cp $filetmp $file
